name: Samhain (zeqelandia)
description:
Developed under 24 hs for the first ever Comodoro Rivadavia's first ever Game Jam. The theme for this jam was halloween, so we looked for the origin of this date. Its based on the celtic celebration called Samhaim, in which the celtics honored their deads, but also protected themselves for the evil spirits. 

Our game picks that celtic culture and ads some action with the powerful style of folk metal. 

The game was developed by zeqelandia and Silvio Martinez using Construct 2.
